alert.note: Alert for Hemphill; Hutchinson; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 5:58PM CDT until June 17 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Hutchinson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Central Roberts County in the Panhandle of Texas... West central Hemphill County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 557 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 15 miles northeast of Skellytown, or 15 miles north of Pampa, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Hutchinson, central Roberts and west central Hemphill Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
